articles.title: Protesters unite against Trump in hundreds of rallies across the U.S. - NPR
articles.description: A grassroots-led campaign organized hundreds of protests and events across the U.S. Organizers say the momentum built on resistance against the Trump administration has not slowed.
articles.content: Protesters turned out to demonstrate against the Trump administration in cities across the U.S. on Saturday, with organizers hoping to seize on what they say is growing resistance to anti-democratic … [+3402 chars]

articles.title: Putin declares 'Easter truce', as Ukraine says he 'cannot be trusted' - BBC
articles.description: The Russian president says he ordered his forces to "stop all military activity" until the end of Sunday.
articles.content:
Russian President Vladimir Putin says he has ordered his forces to "stop all military activity" in Ukraine, as he declared an "Easter truce" until the end of Sunday.

articles.title: Dave Filoni Explains the Impact Losing Ray Stevenson Had on Ahsoka Season 2 - Gizmodo
articles.description: Game of Thrones actor Rory McCann is in season two of Ahsoka, taking over the role of Baylan Skoll from the late Ray Stevenson.
articles.content: When Ray Stevenson died, Ahsoka season two almost died with it. Dave Filoni, the show’s creator, was at Star Wars Celebration Japan this weekend and did a panel about his Disney+ show. Along the way,… [+3466 chars]

articles.title: Thousands gather in London to support trans rights following UK ruling over definition of woman - AP News
